description: Yellow belt techniques building on white belt foundation

terms.definition: Kick delivered straight forward with the ball of the foot
terms.notes: Target: solar plexus or face. Keep supporting leg stable

terms.definition: Upward blocking motion to deflect overhead attacks
terms.notes: Protects head area. Forearm moves from low to high

terms.definition: Straight punch aimed at the middle section of the body
terms.notes: Target: solar plexus. Most common attacking technique
